channel.title: 数字花园
channel.description: 最近的10条笔记 on 数字花园

item.title: Authoring Content
item.description: All of the content in your Quartz should go in the /content folder. The content for the home page of your Quartz lives in content/index.md.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Quartz is meant to be extremely configurable, even if you don’t know any coding.

item.title: Migrating from Quartz 3
item.description: As you already have Quartz locally, you don’t need to fork or clone it again.

item.title: Area
item.description: EE 电子基础 C语言 KM 数字花园 .

item.title: ARM
item.description: Internationalization allows users to translate text in the Quartz interface into various supported languages without needing to make extensive code changes.

item.title: CPP
item.description: Quartz emits listing pages for any folders and tags you have. Folder Listings Quartz will generate an index page for all the pages under that folder.

item.title: C语言
item.description: A backlink for a note is a link from another note to that note. Links in the backlink pane also feature rich 求职招聘 if you have that feature enabled.

item.title: Linux
item.description: Quartz uses Katex by default to typeset both inline and block math expressions at build time.

item.title: OxHugo Compatibility
item.description: org-roam is a plain-text personal knowledge management system for emacs.

item.title: RTOS
item.description: Quartz supports Mermaid which allows you to add diagrams and charts to your notes.
